title: Trump threatens 200% tariff on alcohol from EU
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has threatened to place a 200% tariff on all alcohol from the European Union.

title: Senate Democrats oppose spending bill as shutdown looms. What to know
shortDescription: Several Senate Democrats have said they will not vote in favor of the current spending bill, raising the chances of a possible government shutdown.

title: Pete Buttigieg announces he will not run for Michigan Senate or governor
shortDescription: Pete Buttigieg announced on Thursday that he will not run for Michigan’s Senate seat, opening a path for him to possibly run for president in 2028.

title: States sue to block Trump from dismantling Education Department
shortDescription: A group of Democratic state attorneys general on Thursday filed a lawsuit seeking to block the Department of Education from mass layoffs.

title: Federal agencies owe Trump layoffs plans today. When will cuts come?
shortDescription: Thursday is the deadline for federal agencies to provide their plans for mass federal employee layoffs to President Donald Trump.

title: Trump pulls plug on CDC nominee ahead of hearing
shortDescription: Dave Weldon, President Trump's choice to lead the CDC, had in the past pushed a debunked link between the measles vaccine and autism.

title: Trump calls EU 'abusive' while threatening 200% tariff on its alcohol
shortDescription: Trump threatened to impose a 200% tariff on European alcohol if the European Union does not abandon its planned tax on American whiskey.

title: Many Americans see Trump's actions on economy as too erratic, poll finds
shortDescription: Trump’s imposition of tariffs on allies such as Canada and Mexico and his refusal to rule out a recession has spooked U.S. markets.

title: Trump unleashes more tariff threats as trade war tensions mount
shortDescription: Donald Trump ratcheted up tariff threats against U.S. trading partners this week, including sweeping fees on imported steel and aluminum.

title: President Trump threatens new EU tariffs
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said he'll hit the European Union with new retaliatory tariffs during his meeting with Ireland's prime minister Micheál Martin.

title: What has happened with Trump's federal layoffs so far?
shortDescription: Tens of thousands more federal employees expect to be terminated. But the firings didn't come out of nowhere.

title: Trump order targeting law firm Clinton tie halted by court
shortDescription: A D.C. federal judge said she will temporarily halt a Trump executive order targeting the law firm Perkins Coie, which represented Hillary Clinton.

title: 7 ways Trump and DOGE have changed the federal workforce
shortDescription: President Trump has made large scale changes to the federal workforce even before receiving mass layoff plans from federal agencies due Thursday.

title: President Trump promises to counter EU's retaliatory tariffs
shortDescription: Escalating a trade war with Europe, President Donald Trump said his administration will counter the European Union's new tariffs on the US.

title: Trump defends Education Department layoffs
shortDescription: President Donald Trump on Wednesday backed his administration's efforts to lay off about half of the Education Department staff.
